name: RobbieRuneer
description:
We are Kalterrier Studios and is own first jam. We are a 2 person team .

Robbie is an IA that only knows to get lightings. Help it to keep alive.

Controls:

With Q and right click you can put a platform for Robbie to walk on.

With W and right click you can put a energy that Robbie knows hot to jump to.

Avoid the spikes or crashing in to a wall.
